mapper.select: SELECT uidA, uidB, nTime FROM Neighbors WHERE uidA = {#uid};
SELECT uidA, uidB, nTime FROM Neighbors WHERE uidA = {#uid} AND uidB in (SELECT uid FROM UserBlock WHERE bid = (SELECT bid FROM UserBlock WHERE uid = #{uid}));

SELECT uidA, uidB, nTime FROM Neighbors WHERE uidA = {#uid} AND uidB in (SELECT uid FROM Blocks NATURAL JOIN UserBlock WHERE hood = (SELECT hood FROM UserBlock NATURAL JOIN Blocks JOIN WHERE uid = #{uid}));
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Neighbors WHERE uidA = #{uidA} AND uidB = #{uidB};
